body_html:
I fixed this problem when building opencv with -DBUILD_TIFF=ON
But there is another problem

undefined reference to std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::_M_replace_aux(unsigned long, unsigned long, unsigned long, char)@GLIBCXX_3.4.21' undefined reference to std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits, std::allocator >::rfind(char, unsigned long) const@GLIBCXX_3.4.21'
pytorch/build/lib/libcaffe2.so: undefined reference to leveldb::DB::Open(leveldb::Options const&, std::string const&, leveldb::DB**)' /lib/libleveldb.so.1: undefined reference to std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits, std::allocator >::compare(char const*) const@GLIBCXX_3.4.21'
/pytorch/build/lib/libcaffe2.so: undefined reference to leveldb::Status::ToString() const' /libleveldb.so.1: undefined reference to std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits, std::allocator >::_M_create(unsigned long&, unsigned long)@GLIBCXX_3.4.21'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
make[2]: *** [bin/tbb_init_test] Error 1
make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/tbb_init_test.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2
Failed to run 'bash ../tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-cuda --use-nnpack --full-caffe2 caffe2 libshm gloo THD c10d'

I already try " conda install libgcc" ,but can't fixed this problem.

body:
I fixed this problem when building opencv with  -DBUILD_TIFF=ON
But there is another problem

undefined reference to `std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::_M_replace_aux(unsigned long, unsigned long, unsigned long, char)@GLIBCXX_3.4.21'
 undefined reference to `std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::rfind(char, unsigned long) const@GLIBCXX_3.4.21'
pytorch/build/lib/libcaffe2.so: undefined reference to `leveldb::DB::Open(leveldb::Options const&, std::string const&, leveldb::DB**)'
/lib/libleveldb.so.1: undefined reference to `std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::compare(char const*) const@GLIBCXX_3.4.21'
/pytorch/build/lib/libcaffe2.so: undefined reference to `leveldb::Status::ToString() const'
/libleveldb.so.1: undefined reference to `std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::_M_create(unsigned long&, unsigned long)@GLIBCXX_3.4.21'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
make[2]: *** [bin/tbb_init_test] Error 1
make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/tbb_init_test.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2
Failed to run 'bash ../tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-cuda --use-nnpack --full-caffe2 caffe2 libshm gloo THD c10d'
 
I already try " conda install libgcc" ,but can't fixed this problem.
